title: DeSantis Signs Digital Bill of Rights for Florida
description: Florida Governor and 2024 presidential hopeful Ron DeSantis speaks during a campaign stop at the Greenville Convention Center in Greenville, S.C., on June 2, 2023.  (Logan Cyrus/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Congress Bill Wants AI Content to Be Labeled

title: SEC Files 13 Charges Against Binance Over ‘Extensive Web of Deception’

title: Twitter’s New CEO Linda Yaccarino Logs First Day in Role

title: Microsoft to Pay $20 Million Fine for Violating Children’s Privacy

title: TSMC Feeling ‘Good’ About Possible Germany Plant, in Talks on Subsidies

title: Apple Unveils Sleek ‘Vision Pro’ Goggles
